body: What the hell is this, Quzilax? There's nothing more of a turn-off than consensual loli sex

Omg omg omg I've found one! I'VE FOUND ONE!!! A MASTERPIECE!!!!!! It's been weeks since I last found one, this is so good I must be dreaming or something, PERFECT loli, perfect guy, fantastic art, fantastic story, not to long or to short, 100/10.
When their upper bodies look like they could belong to a boy, I loose interest. I am a poor excuse for a lolicon.
This is wholesome, unlike those before.
Holy shit, all these years and I had no idea. Imma need to check the date on the original source and compare anything to whatever release on doujinshir.org

I was late

@Ketchup
Jesus must have came down from Heaven and slapped him for his bad taste in loli.

Quzilax posted a Twitter thread responding to an article that quoted him saying "'From now on, I will never draw manga depicting a girl being victimized sexually" Prepare for a long blog post.
https://twitter.com/quzilaxxx/status/875275794448236545
Im jelly man
Fuck this shit. This is not quzilax. The real quzilax writes hardcore lolicon stories. I want him back!
Its not to difficukt to assume he just developed a new artstyle?

It's different because this is one of his oldest works, from 2008. I don't think he was ever actually arrested just questioned by police after some sick fuck decided to act out the geiger counter story irl.

This might be someone assuming his name. The art is much too different and the story is too vanilla. 

He hasn't uploaded in a couple of years, and I could of swore he was arrested.

I hope this is the real deal, but I don't think it is :(
I want this life for myself.
holy shit its been a while,i thought this dude is arrested or probably beaten up somewhere in the dark alley....
Enlightenment! So, so... lolicon...
I see, now everything is clear
good stuff

regular person-police he over there get him
me-*runs away*
Wow, so sweet
Eh... it's not like him
Is this really him? Doesn't look like his style
*Geiger Counter 1&2 (sorry, forgot the name)
Seems like after his notorious work, Gegei Counter 1&2 , the authority have involved in and force him to draw sth more normal/ less dark
Greatest love story ever told.
A cute Vanilla from Quizilax without a bad ending?! That's new! Well, not that I complain, at least his art is good and now he do vanilla loli :D
Holy shit Quzilax?! I thought you were dead or arrested!
